name: Boom (Markt & Technik)
overview: Released in 64'er Sonderheft 90, in this game by Matthias Kramm, releasd in 1993, aliens are attacking the last bulwark. Alarm! Radar-bound armada of extraterrestrial spaceships heading toward our solar system at more than the speed of light. Prevent the earth from falling into alien hands!
